snippet: As Apple prepares to enter the fray, it’s a good time to assess the free and paid services that Spotify, Rdio and others have to offer.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column looks at variety of streaming music apps, many of them free.
lead_paragraph: As Apple prepares to enter the fray, it’s a good time to assess the free and paid services that Spotify, Rdio and others have to offer.

headline.print_headline: Streaming Music for a Variety of Tastes
headline.main: Video Feature: Streaming Music Apps for a Variety of Tastes
